name: Flags! - Maritime signal flags
description:
Flags! is a complete reference of all the International Maritime Signal Flags. It includes a full list of flag letters, numbers and substitutes.

Learn faster and test your knowledge with custom quizzes.

Features:
- List of all letter, number and substitute flags
- Detail view of each flag
- Learn with quizzes
- Universal app (iPhone, iPad and Apple Watch)
- Beautiful minimalistic flat design
